summary: Depeche Mode is an English electronic band formed in 1980. Originally a four-piece, they are now a duo: Dave Gahan and Martin Gore. They released their first album, *Speak & Spell*, in 1981, and had many lineup changes over the years. Their seventh album, *Violator* (1990), was a big success, reaching number seven on the Billboard 200. They've sold over 100 million records worldwide and have been inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame. Depeche Mode is known for their influential role in electronic and alternative music.
title: Depeche Mode
